item.title: Need help with compiler! keeps giving errors
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Above

if(c.playerRights >= 0) {

			if (playerCommand.startsWith("cbspeak") && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("roman"))) {
				for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
					if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
						Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
						c2.sendMessage("[@blu@CB-Mod@bla@] " + c.playerName + ": @bla@" + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(7)));
					}
				}
			}
}

add a bracket, so it looks like this:

[code=java]}
if(c.playerRights >= 0) {

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("cbspeak") && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("roman"))) {
			for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
				if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
					Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
					c2.sendMessage("[@blu@CB-Mod@bla@] " + c.playerName + ": @bla@" + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(7)));
				}
			}
		}

} [/code]

and under

if (playerCommand.startsWith("noclip")) {
if(c.playerRights == 3){
c.logout();

add 2 brackets, so it looks like this

if (playerCommand.startsWith("noclip")) {
if(c.playerRights == 3){
c.logout();
}
}

Read full topic
